name: THIS IS... Your World
description:
What do you know about your world? 

‘THIS IS… Your World’ is a new quiz game guaranteed to reveal surprising truths about the planet you live on.
Collect and compare over 200 cards from all corners of the Earth, including all 50 US States. 

If you can answer these, then try the harder challenges in the game!
What country is the biggest? Canada or Russia?
Who has the bigger economy? California or Italy? 
Which has the highest mountain? The United States or Australia?
Where is the homicide rate higher? Alaska or Mexico?
Who has the longer life expectancy? France or China?
Which has the largest population? Japan or the United Kingdom?

Win the game by correctly placing your cards into a list of countries. 
Play alone, play offline, play against friends. 
‘THIS IS… Your World’  is super educational.
